document_data.name: Lionwinter
document_data.mainbody: '''Lionwinter''' was one of the Palace families who served the Crown of [[Cormyr]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
In of the {{YearlinkName|1352}}, [[Relvarra Lionwinter]] of the Palace Lionwinters, accepted the position of the [[Gardener Royal]]. The position was created when King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]] ascended to the Dragon Throne and Relvarra took office after her predecessor's â€“ Gordroun Palonder's death.{{cite web| url = https://web.archive.org/web/20211028234155/http://candlekeep.com/downloads/So_Saith_Ed_Part25_%282010-2016%29.zip| title = So Saith Ed 2010-2016| accessdate = 25-11-2021| date = 25-11-2021}}

By the late 15{{th}} century DR, Lionwinters were career officiers for multiple generations. Like other officers and chamberlains, the Lionwinter family resided at [[Cormyr's Royal Court]] south of [[Castle Obarskyr]].
